question: [File: aptos-core/execution/executor-benchmark/src/measurements.rs] [Struct: OverallMeasurement] [Lifetime] Are references to prefix and metadata strings properly managed? Can dangling references occur if these strings are freed while OverallMeasurement exists? (Medium)
